
 \[WARNING\] Warning                                                                                                      

 ! \[CAUTION\] Caution                                                                                                    

 \[ERROR\] Error                                                                                                          

 \[OK\] Success                                                                                                           

 ! \[NOTE\] Note                                                                                                          

 \[INFO\] Info                                                                                                            

X \[CUSTOM\] Custom block
